de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config
Class CSysConfigException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          de.systemagmbh.interfaces.ASysException
              de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config.CSysConfigException
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysECDOffsets, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSysConfigCastException, CSysConfigFormatException, CSysConfigIOException, CSysConfigNotFoundException, CSysItemNotFoundException
public class CSysConfigException
extends ASysException

This is the base exception class for all config managers. Other config manager exceptions can extend this exception.

Version:
$Revision: 1.10 $
Author:
Torsten Knauft, Eugen Obermeier
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int ERROR_CAST_EXCEPTION
          This error code indicates that there is a problem in converting the value to the expected class.
static int ERROR_CONFIG_FORMAT_EXCEPTION
          This error code indicates that there is a problem concerning the format of the configuration.
static int ERROR_CONFIG_IO_EXCEPTION
          This error code indicates that there is a problem reading the configuration.
static int ERROR_CONFIG_LOAD_CLASS
          This error code indicates that there is a problem loading the given configuration class.
static int ERROR_CONFIG_NO_CLASS
          This error code indicates that there is no configuration class given.
static int ERROR_CONFIG_NO_SOURCE_NAME
          This error code indicates that the source name for reading the configuration is missing.
static int ERROR_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND
          This error code indicates that the given configuration can not be found.
static int ERROR_CONFIG_READ
          This error code indicates that there is a problem reading the configuration.
static int ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND
          This error code indicates that the requested item can not be found in the configuration.

getType

public String getType()
Description copied from class: ASysException
Every Implementing class must at least override this.
This must return the corresponding type defined in ISysComponent if available.

Specified by:
getType in class ASysException
Returns:
the component type to that the exception belongs.
